import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Cookies from 'js-cookie'; function NavBar({isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn }) { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [isLoggedOut, setIsLoggedOut] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(()=>{ const token = Cookies.get('Token'); if(token){ setIsLoggedIn(true) } }) const handleSearchChange = (e) => { [input,setInput] = useState(""); const fetchData = (value) => { fetch("http://localhost:5002/getProductsWithImage") } }; const handleLogout = () => { setIsLoggedIn(false); Cookies.remove('Token'); Cookies.remove('user_id'); // Redirect the user to the home page after logging out navigate('/'); }; return (
<>
GEAR UP SHOP
HOME Shop Contact About
{/* This is an example component */}
setInput(e.target.value)} />
{isLoggedIn ? ( ) : ( "Sign in / sign up" )} {isLoggedIn && ( )}
); } export default NavBar;
